Added our _P.generosa_ [metagenomics sequencing data ](https://robertslab.github.io/sams-notebook/2018/08/09/data-received-geoduck-metagenome-hiseqx-data.html) to NCBI sequencing read archive (SRA).

All data is accessible via the following BioProject accession:

- [PRJNA649049](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/bioproject/PRJNA649049)

Table with links to individual BioSample and SRA Run entries:
